segments.text: It's kind of sweet seeing the kids sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's all stretched out on that stool, grabbing from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently with her hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like they're having a fun little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, plenty for both of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman's busy with her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running in the sink, but it's not too bad yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor adds to the playful mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight through the window lights up the whole scene nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting, like a perfect day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent this mischief seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Makes me smile thinking of my own childhood snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR
